description:
Ever wanted to freak someone out by sending a message to them but didn't want them to know your number? This app eliminates that possibility. Anonymously tXting allows you to insert a person's phone number and send them a message without using your phone number. This app uses web technology to send messages from an online server instead of your phone so it will not use your texts.

List of compatible carriers:
AT&T
Verizon
Sprint
Virgin Mobile
Tracfone
Boost
Tmobile
Cricket
Metro PCS
Cellular One

To have a carrier added to this list please email support@thepcrealm.com
